entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing drizzle in the morning then to drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Drizzle ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
